Text.Page:
Well, we certainly got their attention, but we need to keep hitting them.

Slay {@LinkCreature:10#23#Midirix}, whom they say has "scales which cannot be scratched, and fangs which cannot be dulled."

Show them you've got courage that can't be matched.
Midirix is out of the pictureâ€”and I bet the picture is starting to look bleak for our scaly friends at the temple.
